title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression on row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression `row[0] equals to 0` or just returning a null result set, the data set returns incorrect results.
OB: When previewing the data set after setting a filter with `row[0] equals to`, the first result record is returned.
EB: The expected result is that `row[0]` cannot be used as a filter expression since it can only be generated after all the data has been fetched.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set a filter in the data set with `row[0] equals to`
2. Click on the Preview tab
